question.ask: Questions 1~2 Your mother lost her mobile phone. Ask two questions in order to help her find it.

std.value: Do you have a computer course in your summer school this year? When will the course start and when will it end?
std.ai: Do you have a computer course in your summer school this year? When will the course start and when will it end?

std.value: What are the available courses for the upcoming summer session? What is the course fee and are there any additional fees?
std.ai: What are the available courses for the upcoming summer session? What is the course fee and are there any additional fees?

std.value: What is the class schedule? Are there any scholarships or financial aid available for students who want to take summer courses?
std.ai: What is the class schedule? Are there any scholarships or financial aid available for students who want to take summer courses?

std.value: When does the summer course start and end? Is the summer course offered online or in-person?
std.ai: When does the summer course start and end? Is the summer course offered online or in-person?

std.value: Who is the teacher for the summer course? Does the summer course include any field trips or hands-on learning experiences?
std.ai: Who is the teacher for the summer course? Does the summer course include any field trips or hands-on learning experiences?

std.value: Is the summer course open to high school students?What is the course schedule for the summer course?
std.ai: Is the summer course open to high school students?What is the course schedule for the summer course?

std.value: Is the summer course available to high school students? What is the duration of the summer course?
std.ai: Is the summer course available to high school students? What is the duration of the summer course?

std.value: Can you provide information about the registration process for high school students? What is the class size for the summer course?
std.ai: Can you provide information about the registration process for high school students? What is the class size for the summer course?

std.value: Hi, I'm calling to ask about your summer program. Can you tell me more about the application process? Also, when is the deadline to apply for the course?
std.ai: Hi, I'm calling to ask about your summer program. Can you tell me more about the application process? Also, when is the deadline to apply for the course?

std.value: Hi there, I'm a high school student looking to join in your summer program. Can you tell me more about the course schedule? How long is the program?
std.ai: Hi there, I'm a high school student looking to join in your summer program. Can you tell me more about the course schedule? How long is the program?

std.value: Who are the course instructors and what educational background do they have?
std.ai: Who are the course instructors and what educational background do they have?

std.value: What kind of software and tools will be used in the course. Will they be provided to the students?
std.ai: What kind of software and tools will be used in the course. Will they be provided to the students?

std.value: What is the main objective of this summer course? How will it help high school students?
std.ai: What is the main objective of this summer course? How will it help high school students?

std.value: When does the course start? Can high school students apply?
std.ai: When does the course start? Can high school students apply?

std.value: What is the course about? How much does it cost?
std.ai: What is the course about? How much does it cost?

std.value: When does the summer course end? Will students receive some kind of certificate after they finish the program?
std.ai: When does the summer course end? Will students receive some kind of certificate after they finish the program?

std.value: How can I apply for the program? Do I have to fill an application form?
std.ai: How can I apply for the program? Do I have to fill an application form?

std.value: How practical is the summer course? What will be taught in the course?
std.ai: How practical is the summer course? What will be taught in the course?

std.value: Can high school student join the program? When did it start?
std.ai: Can high school student join the program? When did it start?

std.value: Where will the summer course be held? What can I learn in the course?
std.ai: Where will the summer course be held? What can I learn in the course?
